review: Love this got it in the room and plan on getting the box to go in the living room saves me $150 on my direct TV bill

review: Love the Fire Stick!!! I bought two so I didn't have to move it from t.v to t.v. And then I canceled my Cable!!! Too much to choose from on the Fire Stick to need it. Works awesome!
author: Luca D.

review: It set up easily and works as well as my Roku. I wanted small for travelling.
author: WAYNE

review: It has continued signal issues but the Roku much further away from the router does not have nearly these issues.
author: C. Rob

review: It runs fast and no buffering or any problems what so ever! I have Amazon Prime so I enjoy so many things for free! Well worth the price!
author: Christopher Dean

review: I'm about to return the 2 out of three we bought. Not what we expected.
author: blessed

review: This little stick packs a lot of punch. It out performs my Sony Blu-ray DVD in all aspects of streaming services like Netflix and Amazon Prime. It also picks up a lot of good free channels. I especially enjoy the Smithsonian channel. If you have cable, it's even better. The price is great too, about half that of the box, and less than a third of a decent Blu-ray player. Do NOT buy a Sony. They run your services through their own servers and if Sony is down, you're down. Have not had that problem with Amazon.
author: LaurieG
